fearGreed.title: Fear & Greed Index
fearGreed.description: Market sentiment based on volatility, momentum, and social signals

hint.title: Market Sentiment
hint.content: Values below 25 indicate extreme fear (potential buying opportunity). Values above 75 suggest extreme greed (potential correction ahead).

hint.title: Altcoin Season Index
hint.content: When 75% of the top 50 altcoins outperform Bitcoin over 90 days, it's 'Altcoin Season'. Low values favor holding BTC, high values favor altcoins.

hint.title: Data Quality
hint.content: Measures how reliable the price data is based on source diversity, update frequency, data recency, and price consistency across sources. Higher scores mean more trustworthy data for analysis.

interpretation.strongBuy: Strong buy conditions - multiple indicators suggest upward momentum
interpretation.moderateBuy: Moderate buy signal - consider entering positions
interpretation.neutral: Neutral - no clear direction, wait for stronger signals
interpretation.moderateSell: Moderate sell signal - consider reducing exposure
interpretation.strongSell: Strong sell conditions - indicators suggest downward pressure

hint.title: Trading Signals
hint.content: The composite score combines multiple technical indicators into a single -100 to +100 value. Positive scores suggest bullish conditions, negative scores suggest bearish. Category breakdowns show which factors are driving the signal.

indicators.title: TECHNICAL INDICATORS
indicators.subtitle: Individual indicator breakdown with historical accuracy
indicators.legend: Accuracy shows how often this indicator correctly predicted price direction historically

categoryDescriptions.trend: Shows overall price direction - moving averages and trend strength indicators
categoryDescriptions.momentum: Measures speed of price changes - identifies overbought/oversold conditions
categoryDescriptions.volatility: Tracks price fluctuations - higher values suggest bigger potential moves
categoryDescriptions.volume: Analyzes trading activity - confirms price movements and identifies interest

hint.title: Technical Indicators
hint.content: Individual indicator values and their Buy/Sell/Hold signals. Each indicator is scored from -100 to +100. Accuracy shows how often each indicator correctly predicted price direction based on historical data.

prediction.title: MARKET PREDICTION

empty.title: No Predictions Yet
empty.description: Generate predictions to start tracking signal accuracy for this asset

prediction.analyzingMarket: Analyzing market indicators and generating predictions for this asset

hint.title: Market Prediction
hint.content: BUY/SELL/HOLD recommendation based on weighted indicator signals. Confidence shows signal strength, Accuracy tracks historical correctness, Win Rate shows overall prediction success rate.

historyHint.title: Prediction History
historyHint.content: Shows the last 3 predictions for each indicator with their outcomes at 5min, 1hr, and 4hr timeframes. Green means the prediction was correct, red means incorrect. The percentage shows lifetime accuracy for each indicator.

timeframe.title: TRADING STYLE
timeframe.subtitle: Choose your trading timeframe to optimize signal weighting

hint.title: Trading Style
hint.content: Select your trading timeframe to optimize how signals are weighted. Scalpers need fast signals, while investors focus on longer-term trends. This affects how the composite score is calculated.
